about_the_game:
Port Aphelion is a trading-simulation and adventure game where players build their economic empire through honest trade, smuggling, bounty-hunting, or all-out piracy!

Features include:
  • Open World
  • Economic Simulation
  • Story mode and Sandbox

Gameplay includes:
  • Navigate the Politics of Multiple Factions.
  • Define Complex Trade Routes to Maximize your Profits!
  • Play as Merchant, Smuggler, Pirate, or Bounty-Hunter!
  • Modify game settings to generate unique star systems!
  • Replay again and again with fractal-generated worlds!
  • As you build large fleets, upgrade your ship captains' skills to improve their ability in combat, trade, and smuggling.
  • Space Battles, Space Piracy, Space Marauding, and Space Madness!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, Intel Core i5 2400s @ 2.5 GHz or AMD FX 4100 @ 3.6
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 680 or AMD Radeon HD7970 or better (2048MB VRAM or more, with Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, Intel Core i5 7400s @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 @ 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 or better (4096MB VRAM or more, with Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
